step_id.description: An unique ID identifying this step. This can be used to implement special behavior in clients.

instructions.description: Human-readable instructions for completing this login step.

fields.description: The list of fields that the user must fill

items.title: Field
items.description: A field that the user must fill

id.description: The ID of the field. This should be used when submitting the form.

name.description: The name of the field shown to the user

description.description: The description of the field shown to the user
examples: Include the country code with a +

pattern.description: A regular expression that the field value must match

url.description: The URL to open when using a webview to extract cookies

cookie_domain.description: The domain of the cookies to extract

local_storage_keys.description: The local storage keys to extract

special_keys.description: Special-cased extraction types that clients must support individually

type.description: The type of thing to display

data.description: The thing to display (raw data for QR, unicode emoji for emoji, plain string for code)

image_url.description: An image containing the thing to display. If present, this is recommended over using data directly. For emojis, the URL to the canonical image representation of the emoji

user_login_id.description: The ID of the user login entry
